Class InputListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • serverPac.InputListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class InputListener
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    Daniel Lavigne 664978 Class Description: Listens for incoming communications and relays the information to the observer.
